          <title>
            <string language="en">Making bread</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bilden des Brotes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fabrication du pain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fazendo o pão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fare pane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατασκευή του ψωμιού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fabricación del pan</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of three illustrations detailing the steps in preparing bread. This figure identifies the ingredients needed in making bread dough. Yeast respiration processes causes the dough to rise resulting in light and spongy bread.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dough</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flour</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">microorganisms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">salt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sugar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">yeast</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von drei Abbildungen, welche die Jobsteps 
genau schildern, wenn Brot vorbereitet wird. Diese Abbildung 
kennzeichnet die Bestandteile, die wenn sie Brotteig benötigt werden,
bildet. Hefeatmung verarbeitet Ursachen der Teig, um zu steigen,
resultierend im hellen und schwammigen Brot.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de trois illustrations détaillant les 
étapes en préparant le pain. Cette figure identifie les 
ingrédients requis en faisant la pâte de pain. La respiration 
de levure traite des causes la pâte pour monter ayant pour résultat 
le pain léger et spongieux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de três ilustrações que detalham 
as etapas em preparar o pão. Esta figura identifica os 
ingredientes necessitados em fazer a massa de pão de pão. A 
respiração do fermento processa causas a massa de pão para 
levantar-se tendo por resultado o pão claro e esponjoso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di tre illustrazioni che 
dettagliano i punti nella preparazione del pane. Questa figura 
identifica gli ingredienti stati necessari nel fare la pasta di pane. 
La respirazione del lievito elabora le cause la pasta per 
aumentare con conseguente pane chiaro e spugnoso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα τριών απεικονίσεων που απαριθμούν τα βήματα 
στην προετοιμασία του ψωμιού. Αυτός ο αριθμός προσδιορίζει 
τα συστατικά που απαιτούνται στην κατασκευή της ζύμης ψωμιού. 
Οι διαδικασίες αναπνοής ζύμης αναγκάζουν τη ζύμη για να 
αυξηθούν με συνέπεια το ελαφρύ και σπογγώδες ψωμί.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de tres ilustraciones que detallan los 
pasos de progresión en la preparación del pan. Esta figura 
identifica los ingredientes necesitados en la fabricación de la pasta
de pan. La respiración de la levadura procesa causas la pasta 
para levantarse dando por resultado el pan ligero y esponjoso.</string>
          </description>
